taskbody.context: The rechargeable battery on your new phone requires a first-time charge of at least 24 hours for optimum performance.

step.cmd: Plug the connector into the jack on the bottom of the phone, and plug the power supply into a standard 120V AC outlet.
step.info: While the battery is charging, a strength indicator appears as a series of boxes in the display. When the charge is complete, the boxes are all solid.

step.cmd: When the charge is complete, unplug the phone.
